author: Ryan Chan
description: “The inspiration comes from a classic cocktail called ‘Bishop’, which involved heating port wine and sugar with a clove-studded orange. There were many variations on this cocktail, so I decided to experiment with ways to adapt the recipe using BACARDÍ rum to create something completely new.”
name: Cuban Bishop
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into heated blazer mug
Ignite mixture and lower garnish through flame into mixture
Remover garnish with tongs and place in serving vessel
POUR the hot drink into serving vessel over garnish
